planner_payload.notes: Create docs/INDEX.md with a concise repository map (frontend routes/stores/APIs, backend routers/services/schemas/tests, docs, scripts, CI). planner_payload.tests:

- Check README link added: rg -n "Repository Index & Map\]\(docs/INDEX.md\)" README.md
- Check docs index link added: rg -n "Repository Index & Map\]\(INDEX.md\)" docs/README.md
- Spot-check key references exist:
  - test -f frontend/src/app/app.routes.ts
  - test -f backend/app/main.py && test -d backend/app/routers && test -d backend/app/services
  - test -f docs/guidelines/angular-coding-guidelines.md && test -f docs/governance/development-governance-handbook.md && test -f docs/ui-design-system.md && test -f docs/ui-layout-requirements.md
